metadata.name: RED CHAKRA
metadata.description:
EVERY NFT COMES WITH A 1 OF 1 GICLEE PRINT SIGNED BY ARTIST SHIPPED INTERNATIONALLY 

ALSO FIRST ACCESS TO NEXT CHAKRA DROP 

ORANGE CHAKRA

The Red Chakra sometimes called the Root Chakra or Muladhara is the very first chakra from the base of the spine.

The red chakra serves as the foundation for the whole chakra system, upon which the other chakras are built.

The first chakra is directly tied to Mother Earth and is associated with the earth element. The Sanskrit term for this energy area is Muladhara, which translates as “root support.”

The red chakra represents the first entrance into the physical world. If you do not initially balance this chakra, you will be unable to go to the next.
